Class MultiUserThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.MultiUserThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MultiUserThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread class for handling multi user connecting at the same time.
    Author:
    Bojun
